value:
$WmMPID_アーサー,ch06_33_Arthur_M_Normal,Face|My mother was a mage too. She
served in the liberation army.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMEID_エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_Normal,Face|The rumors aren't out of your
control...are they, Letizia?$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face|...I am perfectly aware of the various
opinions passed among the empire's
ignorant masses.$k$p"Letizia or Veronica... Which is telling
the truth?" At the moment, six out of
ten people believe my side of things.$k$p$WmMEID_エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Well, well. Impressive! Spread enough
lies, and the truth is whatever you
want it to be, just like you said...$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...$k$p$WmMEID_エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_Normal,Face|Something wrong?$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...The propaganda we've been putting
out should have had a greater impact
on swaying the public.$k$pOur tactics were...calculated.
Dissent should have disappeared.$k$pAnd yet...I am barely holding on to
control of the narrative. Why do so
many still have faith in Veronica?$k$pThese simpletons... Is there nothing
that can make them see the truth?!$k$p$WmMEID_エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_Normal,Face|Quite the quandary...$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face|I simply need to reinforce Veronica's
criminality—embroil her in even more
scandal... Whatever it takes!$k$pI control the truth in Embla! And now
I will prove it to you, little Veronica...$k$p$Sbs150|
